detail.name: Angelina Johnson
detail.text: Before each of your turns, if there is a Match in play, you get 1 more Action that turn.
detail.flavorText: '... what an excellent Chaser that girl is, and rather attractive, too — ' — Lee Jordan, commentator

detail.name: Arthur Weasley
detail.text: Once per turn, you may use an Action to choose 1 of your Items in play and do damage to your opponent equal to its printed Power cost.
detail.flavorText: 'He was a thin man, going bald, but the little hair he had was as red as any of his children's.'

detail.name: Blagging
detail.text: Do 8 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in play (other than his or her starting Character), he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.
detail.flavorText: ''Will you stop messing around!' he yelled. 'That's exactly the sort of thing that'll lose us the match!'' — Oliver Wood

detail.name: Body Blow
detail.text: Do 8 damage to your opponent. Then your opponent may choose a Lesson card from his or her hand and discard it. If he or she does, you take 8 damage.

detail.name: Broken Wand
detail.text: You may use an Action to reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Lesson card, put it into play. If it isn't a Lesson card, discard it. If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.

detail.name: The Burrow
detail.text: Before each player's turn, if that player has fewer than 4 cards in his or her hand, that player draws cards until he or she has 4.
detail.flavorText: '... Harry, grinning widely, said, 'This is the best house I've ever been in.''
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Colin Creevey
detail.text: Once per turn, you may use an Action to draw 3 cards and then make your opponent draw 3 cards.
detail.flavorText: 'I never knew all the odd stuff I could do was magic till I got the letter from Hogwarts. My dad's a milkman, he couldn't believe it either.'

detail.name: Crazed Capybara
detail.text: When you play this card, draw a card.

detail.name: De-Gnoming the Garden
detail.effect: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, if he or she has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent discards 5 cards in this way.
detail.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Dobby's Disappearance
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and return it to his or her hand. You get 1 more Action this turn.
detail.flavorText: ''Dobby must go!' breathed the elf, terrified; there was a loud crack, and Harry's fist was suddenly clenched on thin air.'

detail.name: Dobby's Help
detail.text: Your opponent draws 10 cards.
detail.flavorText: 'You know what, Harry? If he doesn't stop trying to save your life he's going to kill you.' — Ron Weasley

detail.name: Double-Beater Defence
detail.text: To play this card, discard 2 other cards from your hand. Do 5 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 2 of them and discards them (1 if he or she has only 1).
detail.flavorText: 'Fred and George Weasley are the Gryffindor Beaters.' — Harry Potter

detail.name: Draco the Seeker
detail.text: If your opponent has any cards in his or her hand, you may use an Action to make him or her choose 1 of them and discard it.
detail.flavorText: '... we're going to make them rue the day they let that little bit of slime, Malfoy, buy his way onto their team.' — Oliver Wood

detail.name: Dragon Poison
detail.text: To play this card, return 2 of your Potions Lessons from play to your hand. Do 10 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

detail.name: Dumbledore's Office
detail.text: All Item cards (yours and your opponent's) need 3 less Power to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)
detail.flavorText: 'It was a large and beautiful circular room, full of funny little noises.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Entrancing Enchantments
detail.text: Search your deck. You may take a Character card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: '... Professor Flitwick knows more about Entrancing Enchantments than any wizard I've ever met, the sly old dog!' — Professor Gilderoy Lockhart

detail.name: Errol
detail.text: When you play this card, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Lesson card, put it into play. If it isn't, put it back on top of your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'He's ancient. It wouldn't be the first time he'd collapsed on a delivery.' — Ron Weasley

detail.name: Escaping the Dursleys
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play non-Lesson cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
detail.reward: Your opponent searches his or her deck for any card, puts it into his or her hand and then shuffles his or her deck.

detail.name: Fat Friar
detail.text: Once per game, you may draw 2 cards, then do 2 damage to your opponent and then put up to 2 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.
detail.flavorText: ''Hope to see you in Hufflepuff!' said the Friar.'

detail.name: Fawkes
detail.text: Each turn, you may prevent 4 damage done to you. If Fawkes is discarded from play, put it into your hand.
detail.flavorText: 'Fawkes,' said Harry, isn't an ordinary bird.'

detail.name: Fighting the Basilisk
detail.effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 5 damage.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discards them.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 7 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Flying Car
detail.text: You may use an Action to choose an Adventure or a Location in play and discard it. (If you discard an Adventure, you don't get the reward.)

detail.name: Flying Laps
detail.text: Count the number of Lessons you have in play. Do that much damage to your opponent. Then draw that many cards.
detail.flavorText: 'He soared right around the stadium at full speed, racing Fred and George.'

detail.name: Flying to Hogwarts
detail.effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 2 damage.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (They don't need to be one right after the other.)
detail.reward: Your opponent may look at your hand, choose 1 of those cards and discard it.

detail.name: Ginny Weasley
detail.text: Before each of your turns, count the number of other Characters you have in play. You may draw that many cards.
detail.flavorText: 'You don't know how weird it is for her to be this shy, she never shuts up normally — ' — Ron Weasley

detail.name: Greenhouse Three
detail.text: Once during each player's turn, when he or she uses an Action to play a Plant card, he or she gets 1 more Action that turn.
detail.flavorText: 'They had only ever worked in Greenhouse One before — Greenhouse Three housed far more interesting and dangerous plants.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Gryffindor Common Room
detail.text: Before each player's turn, he or she counts the number of Gryffindor cards he or she has in play and may draw that many cards.
detail.flavorText: 'They ... found themselves in the Gryffindor common room, a cosy, round room full of squashy armchairs.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Harry, Second Year
detail.text: At the start of the game, if Harry, Second Year is your starting Character, secretly write down the name of a Creature, Item or Spell card. If your opponent plays that card, you may reveal what you wrote down. If you do, at the end of that turn, you may shuffle up to 20 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

detail.name: Hermione, Potion Maker
detail.text: You may use an Action to put up to 2 Lesson cards of different types from your hand into play.
detail.flavorText: 'I'm sure I've done everything right,' said Hermione, nervously re-reading the splotched page of Moste Potente Potions.'

detail.name: Impersonating Goyle
detail.text: Choose a Character in play (other than a starting Character) and discard it. Then search your deck. You may take a Character card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Ron, who had been gazing at Harry, said, 'You don't know how bizarre it is to see Goyle thinking.''

detail.name: In the Spider's Lair
detail.effect: Before each of your turns, you may show your opponent any number of Creature cards from your hand. Your opponent takes that much damage.
detail.reward: If you have any cards in your hand, you choose 1 of them and discard it.

detail.name: Justin Finch-Fletchley
detail.text: You may use an Action to draw 2 cards and then put 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck (in any order).
detail.flavorText: 'My name was down for Eton, you know, I can't tell you how glad I am I came here instead.'

detail.name: Lockhart's Lecture
detail.effect: Whenever you use an Action to play a Spell, your opponent says 'Brilliant!' If your opponent forgets, he or she takes 3 damage at the end of that turn.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent lets you have 4 more Actions on your next turn.

detail.name: Mandrake
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard Mandrake from play to put a non-Healing Character card from your discard pile into your hand.
detail.flavorText: 'Instead of roots, a small, muddy and extremely ugly baby popped out of the earth.'

detail.name: Memory Charm
detail.text: Your opponent chooses 1 card in his or her hand and discards the rest.
detail.flavorText: 'If there's one thing I pride myself on, it's my Memory Charms.' — Professor Gilderoy Lockhart

detail.name: Moaning Myrtle's Bathroom
detail.text: Before each player's turn, if he or she has at least 2 Characters in play (including his or her starting Character), he or she gets 1 more Action that turn.
detail.flavorText: 'It was the gloomiest, most depressing bathroom Harry had ever set foot in.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Molly Weasley
detail.text: You may use an Action to search your deck. You may take a Character card from your deck , show it to your opponent and  put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Mrs Weasley fussed over the state of his socks and tried to force him to eat fourth helpings at every meal.'

detail.name: Nimbus Two Thousand and One
detail.text: Whenever one of your Quidditch Spells does damage to your opponent, it does 3 more damage. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

detail.name: No Hands
detail.text: Play this card only if there is a Match in play. Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Lesson card, you win the current Match (you get the prize). Otherwise, you take 3 damage.
detail.flavorText: 'Harry took his remaining hand off his broom and made a wild snatch; ...'

detail.name: Norwegian Ridgeback
detail.text: To play this card, return 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play to your hand.
detail.flavorText: 'They're rare, ...' — Rubeus Hagrid

detail.name: Percy Weasley
detail.text: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, if he or she played a non-Lesson card that turn, he or she takes 1 damage.
detail.flavorText: ''I,' said Percy, drawing himself up, 'am a Prefect. Nothing's about to attack me.''

detail.name: Petrified
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures or Characters in play (other than his or her starting Character) and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.
detail.flavorText: ''She has been Petrified,'' said Dumbledore ... 'But how, I cannot say ...''

detail.name: Phoenix Tears
detail.text: To play this card, return 4 of your Potions Lessons from play to your hand. Shuffle up to 16 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Fascinating creatures, phoenixes. They can carry immensely heavy loads, their tears have healing powers and they make highly faithful pets.' — Albus Dumbledore

detail.name: Potions Test
detail.text: Your opponent takes damage until he or she discards a total of 3 Lesson cards from his or her deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Snape prowled through the fumes, making waspish remarks about the Gryffindors' work while the Slytherins sniggered appreciatively.'

detail.name: Professor Pomona Sprout
detail.text: Each of your Plants has 2 more Health.
detail.flavorText: '... there was usually a large amount of earth on her clothes, and her fingernails would have made Aunt Petunia faint.'

detail.name: Reparo
detail.text: Put a non-Healing card from your discard pile into your hand.
detail.flavorText: 'Mr Weasley took Harry's glasses, gave them a tap of his wand and returned them, good as new.'

detail.name: Rogue Bludger
detail.text: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 3 damage.

detail.name: Ron, Youngest Brother
detail.text: If you have no cards in your hand, you may use an Action to draw 5 cards.
detail.flavorText: 'Everyone expects me to do as well as the others, but if I do, it's no big deal, because they did it first.'

detail.name: Serpensortia
detail.text: Search your deck. You may take up to 2 Creature cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Malfoy raised his wand quickly and bellowed, 'Serpensortia!''

detail.name: Slytherin Common Room
detail.text: Before each player's turn, he or she counts the number of Slytherin cards he or she has in play and does that much damage to his or her opponent.
detail.flavorText: 'The Slytherin common room was a long, low underground room with rough stone walls and ceiling, from which round, greenish lamps were hanging on chains.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Spiders' Exodus
detail.text: Return all Creatures in play (yours and your opponent's) to their owners' hands.
detail.flavorText: ''Have you ever seen spiders act like that?' said Hermione wonderingly.'

detail.name: Venomous Tentacular Juice
detail.text: Count the number of cards in your opponent's hand. He or she draws twice that many cards.
detail.flavorText: ''His insides were burning ...'

detail.name: The Weasley Twins
detail.text: Before each of your turns, if you have an Adventure in play, your opponent takes 2 damage.
detail.flavorText: 'You had to hand it to them, thought Harry, as George took an ordinary hairpin from his pocket and started to pick the lock.'

detail.name: Whomping Willow
detail.text: To play this card, return 3 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play to your hand. Before each of your turns, if your opponent has any Items in play, choose 1 of them and discard it.
detail.flavorText: 'Of all the trees we could've hit, we had to get one that hits back.' — Ron Weasley

detail.name: Wizard Chess
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard 1 of your Lessons from play to do 2 damage to your opponent.

detail.name: Angel's Trumpet Draught
detail.text: To play this card, return 2 of your Potions Lessons from play to your hand. Do 7 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

detail.name: Blocked!
detail.text: Draw 4 cards. Then your opponent may choose a Lesson card from his or her hand and discard it. If he or she does, you choose 3 cards in your hand and discard them.

detail.name: Blocked Barrier
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Location cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 2 Location cards in his or her hand and discards them.
detail.reward: Once during this turn, when your opponent uses an Action to play a Location card, he or she gets 2 more Actions this turn.

detail.name: Bundimun Ooze
detail.text: Your opponent chooses 1 of his or her Creatures or Items in play and discards it. Then he or she takes damage equal to that card's printed Power cost.

detail.name: Caught!
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discard it. Your opponent may prevent this by choosing 4 cards in his or her hand and discarding them.

detail.name: Caught by Snape
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play any cards except Lesson cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent uses Actions to play Lesson cards 3 times. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
detail.reward: Your opponent may put any number of Lesson cards from his or her hand into play.

detail.name: Checked!
detail.text: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then your opponent may choose a Lesson card in his or her hand and discard it. If he or she does, you take 4 damage.

detail.name: Cleansweep Five
detail.text: When you play this card, look at the top 2 cards of your deck (1 if there is only 1) and put both of them on the bottom or back on the top of your deck in any order. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

detail.name: Counter Curse
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Snape stepped forward, waved his wand and the snake vanished in a small puff of black smoke.'

detail.name: Dragon-Dung Compost
detail.text: Before each of your turns, count the number of Plants you have in play. Do that much damage to your opponent.

detail.name: Earmuffs
detail.text: Once during each of your turns, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play. Prevent up to 3 damage from that Creature on your opponent's next turn.

detail.name: Endless Sandwiches
detail.text: Play this card only if you have fewer than 7 other cards in your hand. Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.
detail.flavorText: 'A large plate of sandwiches, two silver goblets and a jug of iced pumpkin juice appeared with a pop.'

detail.name: Floo Powder
detail.text: Search your deck. You may take a Location card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Floo powder's a lot quicker, dear, but goodness me, if you've never used it before – ' – Mrs Weasley

detail.name: Forgotten Password
detail.text: During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Lesson cards.
detail.flavorText: 'I've been out here for hours. I couldn't remember the new password to get in to bed.' – Neville Longbottom

detail.name: Invisibility Section
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discard it. Then he or she chooses 1 of your cards in play (other than your starting Character) and discards it.
detail.flavorText: '... he paused to listen, hidden in the Invisibility section.'

detail.name: Keeping Dobby Quiet
detail.effect: Your opponent discards the card drawn at the start of each of his or her turns.
detail.flavorText: 'Er – I don't want to be rude or anything, but – this isn't a great time for me to have a house-elf in my bedroom.' – Harry Potter

detail.name: Locked In
detail.effect: Your opponent gets 1 fewer Action on each of his or her turns (even the turn this Adventure is solved). (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets 1 Action.)
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 cards in his or her hand and discards them.

detail.name: Lockhart's Hair-Care Potions
detail.text: Whenever you play a Character card, you use up 1 Action to play it instead of 2.

detail.name: Magical Mess Remover
detail.text: Choose any number of your cards in play (other than your starting Character) and discard them.
detail.flavorText: 'Harry had seen him scrubbing the message on the wall with 'Mrs Skower's All-Purpose Magical Mess Remover,' but to no effect; ...'

detail.name: Potions Project
detail.text: Your opponent takes damage until he or she discards a total of 2 Lesson cards from his or her deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Potions lessons took place in one of the large dungeons.'

detail.name: Prickly Porcupine
detail.text: When you play this card, draw a card.

detail.name: Pure-Blood
detail.text: When you play this card, play it face down and tell your opponent to guess 'Pure-Blood', 'Sherbet Lemon' or 'Wattlebird'. If he or she guesses 'Pure-Blood', nothing happens. Otherwise, do 8 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: 'What's the new password again?' he said to Harry.'

detail.name: Rabbit Slippers
detail.text: Choose up to 2 Creatures in play and discard them.
detail.flavorText: 'Harry looked down at the pair of white rabbits he was supposed to be turning into slippers.'

detail.name: Rainy-Day Match
detail.toSolve: Do 9 damage to your opponent. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
detail.reward: Winner shuffles up to 6 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

detail.name: Second-Hand Robe Shop
detail.text: Whenever a Spell card (yours or your opponent's) does damage to a player, it does 1 less damage to that player.
detail.flavorText: 'I expect we'll be able to pick up a lot of Ginny's things second-hand.' – Mrs Weasley
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Self-Shuffling Cards
detail.text: You may use an Action to have both players shuffle their decks.

detail.name: Sherbet Lemon
detail.text: When you play this card, play it face down and tell your opponent to guess 'Pure-Blood', 'Sherbet Lemon' or 'Wattlebird'. If he or she guesses 'Sherbet Lemon', nothing happens. Otherwise, do 8 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: 'What's the new password again?' he said to Harry.'

detail.name: Swelling Solution
detail.text: Do 8 damage to your opponent. He or she can prevent this by choosing 3 cards in his or her hand and discarding them.
detail.flavorText: 'Harry tried not to laugh as he watched Malfoy hurry forward, his head drooping with the weight of a nose like a small melon.'

detail.name: Through the Floo
detail.effect: Before each of your opponent's turns, he or she draws 3 cards and then chooses 3 cards in his or her hand and discards them.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 1 of his or her Locations in play or 4 of his or her Lessons in play and discards them.

detail.name: Twirl
detail.text: Do 5 damage to your opponent. Then, if he or she has any cards in play other than Lessons (or his or her starting Character), he or she chooses 1 of those cards and returns it to his or her hand.
detail.flavorText: ''Training for the ballet, Potter?' yelled Malfoy, as Harry was forced to do a stupid kind of twirl in mid-air to dodge the Bludger.'

detail.name: Umbrella Flowers
detail.text: Once per turn, you may let Umbrella Flowers take 1 damage that you were going to take.

detail.name: Venomous Tentacula
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard Venomous Tentacula from play to put a Potions Lesson from your discard pile into play.
detail.flavorText: '... be careful of the Venomous Tentacula, it's teething.' – Professor Sprout

detail.name: Wattlebird
detail.text: When you play this card, play it face down and tell your opponent to guess 'Pure-Blood', 'Sherbet Lemon' or 'Wattlebird'. If he or she guesses 'Wattlebird', nothing happens. Otherwise, do 8 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: ''Skip the lecture,' said Ron impatiently, and tell us the new password.'

detail.name: Windy-Day Match
detail.toSolve: Use Actions to play Spell cards 2 times while this card is in play.

detail.name: Aparecium
detail.text: Show your hand to your opponent. Put all Lesson cards there into play.
detail.flavorText: 'She tapped the diary three times and said, 'Aparecium!''

detail.name: Backfire!
detail.text: Do 5 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: '... Ron's wand was still malfunctioning, surpassing itself on Friday morning by shooting out of Ron's hand in Charms and hitting tiny old Professor Flitwick squarely between the eyes, ...'

detail.name: Badgered Boy
detail.text: Search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Professor McGonagall was shouting at someone who, by the sound of it, had turned his friend into a badger.'

detail.name: Beater's Bat
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard a card from your hand to do 2 damage to your opponent.

detail.name: Beetle Buttons
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and discard it.
detail.flavorText: '... Ron's mood was not improved by Hermione showing them the handful of perfect coat buttons she had produced in Transfiguration.'

detail.name: Catching Apples
detail.text: Do 3 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in play (other than his or her starting Character), he or she chooses 1 of them and returns it to his or her hand.
detail.flavorText: 'They couldn't use real Quidditch balls, which would have been hard to explain if they had escaped and flown away over the village; instead they threw apples for each other to catch.'

detail.name: Chudley Cannons Robes
detail.text: You may use an Action to put up to 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck (in any order).

detail.name: Copper Cauldron
detail.text: To play this card, return 1 of your Potions Lessons from play to your hand.

detail.name: Death-Cap Draught
detail.text: To play this card, return 1 of your Potions Lessons from play to your hand. Do 6 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

detail.name: Deboning
detail.text: During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play cards.
detail.flavorText: 'Ah. Yes. Well, that can sometimes happen. But the point is, the bones are no longer broken.'

detail.name: Dizziness Draught
detail.text: Do 4 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Quidditch cards.

detail.name: Engorgement Charm
detail.text: Remove all damage counters from all of your Creatures in play.
detail.flavorText: ''An Engorgement Charm, I suppose?' said Hermione, halfway between disapproval and amusement. Well, you've done a good job on them.'

detail.name: Evanesce
detail.text: Choose a Creature or Lesson in play and discard it.
detail.flavorText: 'Professor McGonagall's classes were always hard work, but today was especially difficult.'

detail.name: Family Ghoul
detail.text: To play this card, return 1 of your Creatures in play to your hand.
detail.flavorText: '... I'm right underneath the ghoul in the attic, he's always banging on the pipes and groaning ...' — Ron Weasley

detail.name: Fatiguing Fusion
detail.text: To play this card, return 1 of your Potions Lessons from play to your hand. Do 9 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

detail.name: Flacking
detail.text: Do 2 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.
detail.flavorText: 'And there's the Keeper, too. He guards the goalposts.' — Harry Potter

detail.name: Freezing Charm
detail.text: Do 4 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
detail.flavorText: 'He just wants to give us some hands-on experience, said Hermione, immobilising two pixies at once with a clever Freezing Charm and stuffing them back into their cage.'

detail.name: Garden Gnome
detail.text: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, if there are any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.
detail.flavorText: 'They love it here ... Dad's too soft with them, he thinks they're funny ...'

detail.name: Gryffindor Lion
detail.flavorText: 'Their daring, nerve and chivalry Set Gryffindors apart; ...' — The Sorting Hat

detail.name: Guide to Household Pests
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to choose a Creature in play and do 4 damage to it.

detail.name: Hair-Raising Potion
detail.text: Do 1 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
detail.flavorText: 'Ron was just saying he wished he had asked Hermione how many rat tails you were supposed to add to a Hair-Raising Potion, ...'

detail.name: Hawkshead Formation
detail.text: Do 6 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: 'Three Chasers on each team throw the Quaffle to each other and try and get it through the goalposts at the end of the pitch — ...' — Harry Potter

detail.name: Hermione's Note
detail.text: Discard the Adventure your opponent has played. You get the reward.
detail.flavorText: 'Ron, he breathed, this is it. This is the answer.' — Harry Potter

detail.name: History of Magic Homework
detail.text: Search your deck. You may take a Lesson card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Hermione, let me read your composition, said Ron desperately, ...'

detail.name: Hover Charm
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and return it to his or her hand.
detail.flavorText: 'Aunt Petunia's masterpiece of a pudding, the mountain of cream and sugared violets, was floating up near the ceiling.'

detail.name: Howler
detail.text: Do 2 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in his or her hand, look at them. Choose 1 of those cards and put it on top of his or her deck.
detail.flavorText: ''You'd better open it, Ron,' said Neville, in a timid whisper. 'It'll be worse if you don't. My Gran sent me one once, and I ignored it and' — he gulped, 'it was horrible.''

detail.name: Hufflepuff Badger
detail.flavorText: 'You might belong in Hufflepuff, Where they are just and loyal, ...' — The Sorting Hat

detail.name: Invisible Ink
detail.text: Choose up to 2 Lessons in play and discard them.
detail.flavorText: ''It might be invisible ink!' she whispered.'

detail.name: Leaping Toadstools
detail.text: Once per turn, you may let Leaping Toadstools take 1 damage that you were going to take.
detail.flavorText: '... Ernie Macmillan asked Harry quite politely to pass a bucket of leaping toadstools in Herbology one day, ...'

detail.name: Overdue Homework
detail.text: Look at your opponent's hand. Count the number of Lesson cards there. Do that much damage to your opponent.

detail.name: Pepperup Potion
detail.text: Put up to 4 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order).
detail.flavorText: 'Her Pepperup Potion worked instantly, though it left the drinker smoking at the ears for several hours afterwards.'

detail.name: Potions Homework
detail.text: Your opponent takes damage until he or she discards a Lesson card from his or her deck.

detail.name: Ransacked!
detail.text: Your opponent chooses 2 cards in his or her hand and discards them (1 if he or she has only 1).
detail.flavorText: ''Someone's been looking for something,' said Ron. 'Is there anything missing?''

detail.name: Ravenclaw Eagle
detail.flavorText: 'Or yet in wise old Ravenclaw, If you've a ready mind, ...' — The Sorting Hat

detail.name: Restoration Potion
detail.text: Do 4 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Transfiguration cards.

detail.name: Revealer
detail.text: You may use an Action to look at your opponent's hand.

detail.name: Rose Growth
detail.text: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then draw a card.

detail.name: Shooting Star
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard a card from your hand to draw 2 cards. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

detail.name: Slinking Ferret
detail.text: When you play this card, draw a card.

detail.name: Slow-Acting Venom
detail.text: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 1 damage.

detail.name: Slytherin Serpent
detail.flavorText: 'Those cunning folk use any means To achieve their ends.' — The Sorting Hat

detail.name: Slytherin Steals
detail.text: Do 2 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in play (other than his or her starting Character), he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

detail.name: Training Programme
detail.text: Draw 2 cards. Then you may put up to 2 Quidditch Lesson cards from your hand into play.
detail.flavorText: ''Oliver,' Harry croaked, 'it's the crack of dawn.''

detail.name: Vanishing Cabinet
detail.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.
detail.flavorText: 'That vanishing cabinet was extremely valuable!' — Argus Filch

detail.name: Zig-Zag
detail.text: Put a non-Healing Quidditch card from your discard pile into your hand.
detail.flavorText: 'On Madam Hooch's whistle, Harry kicked hard into the air and heard the tell-tale whoosh of the Bludger behind him.'

detail.name: Care of Magical Creatures
detail.text: Provides 1 Care of Magical Creatures lesson.

detail.name: Charms
detail.text: Provides 1 Charms lesson.

detail.name: Potions
detail.text: Provides 1 Potions lesson.

detail.name: Quidditch
detail.text: Provides 1 Quidditch lesson.

detail.name: Transfiguration
detail.text: Provides 1 Transfiguration lesson.
